com.esri.mo2.util
Class FloatingPointCompare

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.util.FloatingPointCompare
public final class FloatingPointCompare
extends Object

Performs floating point comparisons between two numbers with an epsilon.

Field Summary
static double DEFAULT_EPSILON
          Default epsilon tolerance is the same as that found in the C language, 2.22044604925031308084726E-16 (2^-52)

eq

public static boolean eq(double x,
                         double y,
                         double eps)
Tests if two values are equal within a tolerance.

Parameters:
x - the value being tested.
y - the ideal value.
eps - the epsilon value
Returns:
true if the test value is within the tolerance of the ideal value, false otherwise
